description.text: Normal Attack
Deal Hydro DMG to an enemy. Has a 4 hit combo.
Charged Attack (Aimed Shot)
Deal AoE Hydro DMG with a 1s delay. Consumes Stamina.
Plunging Attack
Drop to the ground below, dealing Hydro DMG on its way, and deal AoE Hydro DMG upon impact.

originalDescription.text: Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 water splashes attacks that deal Hydro DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

description.text: Press
Summons a Melody Loop on herself, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding enemies and applies Wet.
Melody Loop
- When Barbara landed a Normal or Charged Attack, heal your own party members and nearby allies, which scales based on her Max HP. Landing a Charged Attack heals for 4x the healing amount.
- Regenerate the active character's HP once every 4 seconds and apply Wet to said character.

originalDescription.text: Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding enemies and afflicting them with the Wet status.
Melody Loop
Barbara's Normal Attacks heal all party members and nearby allied characters for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP.
Her Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing.
Regenerates a certain amount of the current character's HP at regular intervals.
Applies the Wet status to the character and enemies who come in contact with them.

description.text: Heals your own party members and nearby allies for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.

originalDescription.text: Heals friendly forces and all parties for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.

description.text: Reduce the Stamina Consumption of characters with Melody Loop by 12%.

originalDescription.text: The Stamina Consumption of characters within Let the Show Begin's Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

description.text: When your active character receives an Elemental Orb/Particle, extend Melody Loop's duration by 1s. The maximum extension is 5s.

originalDescription.text: When a character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of Let the Show Begin's Melody Loop is extended by 1s.
The maximum extension is 5s.

description.text: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

originalDescription.text: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

description.text: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

originalDescription.text: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

description.text: Decreases Elemental Skill CD by 15%
During Melody Loop's duration, the active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus

originalDescription.text: Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin by 15%.
During the ability's duration, the current character gains 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

description.text: Increases Elemental Burst's level by 3.
Increases Elemental Burst's max level by 5 (to 15).

originalDescription.text: Increases the Level of Shining Miracle by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

description.text: Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her, for a maximum of 5 energy with any one Charged Attack

originalDescription.text: Every enemy hit by Barbara's Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her. A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

description.text: Increases Elemental Skill's level by 3.
Increases Elemental Skill's max level by 5 (to 15).

originalDescription.text: Increase the Level of Let the Show Begin by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

description.text: When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls: Automatically revives the fallen character at 100% HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

originalDescription.text: When Barbara is not on the field, and the character in play falls:
Automatically revives this character.
Fully regenerates this characters HP by 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.
